moretraps.name: MoreTraps
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.moretraps: Adds skeleton-horse-type traps to other mobs.
fml.menu.mods.info.description.moretraps: Adds skeleton-horse-type traps to other mobs.
message.moretraps.install_yacl: Install Yet Another Config Lib to access mod options
option.moretraps.general.debugMode.toolt: Highlights Source Entities and logs trap creation and activation. Note: glowing effect is applied for 120s, relog or otherwise reload chunks to re-apply.
option.moretraps.general.trapRange.toolt: Distance at which traps will activate.
option.moretraps.general.allowInstant.to: Allow trap Source Entities to spawn within activation range plus one block of a player.
Duration in seconds for status effects applied to Spawn Entities when a trap is triggered. Set to -1 for infinite duration.
option.moretraps.general.showParticles.t: Whether to show status effect particles for Spawn Entities.
option.moretraps.trapGroup.sourceId.tool: The ID of the entity to trigger the trap.
option.moretraps.trapGroup.spawnId.toolt: The ID of the entity spawned when the trap is activated.
option.moretraps.trapGroup.passengerId.t: The ID of the entity riding the Spawn Entity (optional).
option.moretraps.trapGroup.passengerOnSo: Whether to spawn a passenger on the Source Entity, as well as on the new Spawn Entities.
Whether to make the Source/Spawn entities ride their Passenger Entities.
option.moretraps.trapGroup.chance.toolti: The chance for a spawned entity to be a trap.
option.moretraps.trapGroup.spawnNum.tool: The number of additional entities (not including passengers) to spawn when the trap is triggered.
option.moretraps.trapGroup.effectNum.too: The sum of status effects and their amplifiers applied each Source/Spawn Entity when the trap is triggered.
